language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: hair of body - no entry for hair of head
as single hair on head (or forehead)
reconstructs to Proto-Chamic but the initial makes it clear that it is borrowed
Hair (of animals and body-hair of humans), fur, feathers, fleece (Bse)
cognate with 'head' terms in other languages
cognate with 'head' terms in other languages
